cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 45 mi (75 km) southeast of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: slowly drifting west-northwest to the central Texas coast, then turning north and northeast along the upper Texas coast toward southwest Louisiana during the next 2-3 days
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast near Port O'Connor / Matagorda area

weather_observation.watch_coast: Baffin Bay to Port Aransas, TX
weather_observation.warning_coast: Port Aransas, TX to Morgan City, LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire upper Texas coast including Galveston Bay to Sabine Pass and southwest Louisiana coastline
weather_observation.wind: Intermittent tropical-storm-force gusts (generally 35-45 mph) possible beginning late Monday night through Tuesday evening
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft inundation possible in Sabine Lake and the Port Arthur area, especially around times of high tide
weather_observation.rainfall: 5–10 inches with locally higher totals could cause flash and urban flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes in outer rain bands and dangerous rip currents/surf conditions
